name: !!!Subway Panic!!!
description:
STORY:
For some reason, a lot of people woke up late this morning and everybody knows that the subway system is impossible to figure out. But you are here to help them understand their ticket and on which train to go. Watch out! Your boss is watching and if you make to many mistake, you'll never work here again.
CONTROL:

Left Mouse ClickSelect and move workersRight Mouse ClickCheck tickets (you can only do it once)
